text: Veronika Mykolaïvna Ivasiuk (, also transliterated Ivasyuk, born 12 October 1995) is a Ukrainian female weightlifter, competing in the 58 kg category and representing Ukraine at international competitions. ==Career== She competed at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships. Ivasyuk won the silver medal at the 2016 European Weightlifting Championships after lifting 90 kg in the snatch.Our weightlifter was ranked second in the snatch , MagaNewsWeb, Retrieved 15 August 2016 She competed in the women's 58 kg event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! rowspan=2 style="width:40px;" | Year ! rowspan=2 style="width:250px;" | Venue ! rowspan=2 style="width:60px;" | Weight ! colspan=4 | Snatch (kg) ! colspan=4 | Clean & Jerk (kg) ! rowspan=2 style="width:40px;" | Total ! rowspan=2 style="width:40px;" | Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|Olympic Games |- |2016 || align=left| Rio de Janeiro, Brazil || 58 kg || ~~87~~ || 87 || 90 || 9 || 98 || 103 || ~~107~~ || 15 || 193 || 13 |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 58 kg ||83||85||87||22||96||101|| ~~103~~ ||28||188||25 |- ! colspan=13|European Championships |- |2016 || align=left| Førde, Norway || 58 kg || 88 || 90 || ~~93~~ || || 105 || 108 || ~~110~~ || 6 || 198 || 4 |- |2017 || align=left| Split, Croatia || 58 kg || 90 || 93 || 95 || || 106 || 111 || ~~115~~ || 9 || 206 || 4 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * * * * * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian female weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Olympic weightlifters of Ukraine Category:Weightlifters at the 2016 Summer Olympics
